Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Captain Archer and temporal agent Daniels have been stranded in the 31st century. In a library they investigate the damage to the time line and try to find way a to get Archer back in his own century. Meanwhile Silik the Suliban l...

Episodes.Title: Carbon Creek
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: On the first anniversary of her assignment to Enterprise, T'Pol tells Archer and Trip about the first contact between humans and Vulcans, which involves three Vulcans becoming stranded in the town of Carbon Creek, Pennsylvania in ...

Episodes.Title: Minefield
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: The safety of Enterprise rests on Reed's shoulders when the ship becomes trapped in a Romulan minefield and Romulan ships are closing in on them.

Episodes.Title: Dead Stop
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise seeks repairs from their encounters with the Romulans, where they stop at a desolate but idyllic repair station. But all is not what it seems when Mayweather is suddenly found dead.

Episodes.Title: A Night in Sickbay
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After previously offending the Kreetassans, Enterprise attempts to make a better second impression, only to upset the alien race once again. A frustrated Captain Archer returns from the planet only to be further upset to find that...

Episodes.Title: Marauders
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise visits a colony with a deuterium trading post. But the people seem to be pretty unwilling to trade. Are they hiding something?

Episodes.Title: The Seventh
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: T'Pol asks Captain Archer to join her on a mission to capture a Vulcan fugitive that escaped her years ago.

Episodes.Title: The Communicator
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Upon returning from covertly observing a pre-warp culture, Lieutenant Reed realizes he lost his communicator somewhere on the planet. Archer and Reed return to recover the lost technology, only to find the natives found it first. ...

Episodes.Title: Singularity
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: T'Pol must save the ship after the crew becomes obsessed with trivialities during the approach to a black hole.

Episodes.Title: Vanishing Point
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After Hoshi uses the transporter to avoid running into a storm, she starts to feel very strange.

Episodes.Title: Precious Cargo
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: While Trip is repairing a stasis pod at a Retellian cargo ship and the woman inside, heir apparent to the throne of Krios, wakes up, the ship makes a hasty departure. Trip must make a plan to escape.

Episodes.Title: The Catwalk
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After receiving a warning about a radioactive storm approaching Enterprise, the crew is forced to take shelter in the ship's catwalk.

Episodes.Title: Dawn
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Trip's shuttlepod is shot down by a hostile race and is forced to land on a deserted moon. There he must team up with the alien who shot him down in order to find a way back to Enterprise.

Episodes.Title: Stigma
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: T'Pol is diagnosed with a possibly fatal neurological disease as a result of a mind meld. Meanwhile, one of Phlox's wives visits Enterprise and becomes very interested in Trip.

Episodes.Title: Cease Fire
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Captain Archer is asked to negotiate between the Andorians and Vulcans who are fighting over a small planet.

Episodes.Title: Future Tense
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise discovers a pod with the body of a human that seems to be wanted by both Sulibans and Tholians.

Episodes.Title: Canamar
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Archer and Trip are accused of smuggling and sent to the penal colony Canamar. While Enterprise manages to negotiate their release, a mutiny breaks out on the prison ship.

Episodes.Title: The Crossing
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise is held captive by non-corporeal beings who claim to be explorers.

Episodes.Title: Judgment
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After Enterprise lends aid to a group of accused rebels, Captain Archer faces a tribunal and charges of conspiring against the Klingon Empire.

Episodes.Title: Horizon
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Mayweather temporarily leaves Enterprise to visit the cargo ship Horizon, where he was born and raised. Meanwhile, the Enterprise crew observes an unusual planetary event.

Episodes.Title: The Breach
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: At Dr. Phlox's request, Enterprise attempts to retrieve 3 Denobulan scientists from the planet Xantoras, where the Goverment has ordered all off-worlders to evacuate within 3 days. Tucker, Reed, and Mayweather navigate a series of...

Episodes.Title: Cogenitor
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: Enterprise encounters a hyper-giant star. While there, they make first contact with the Vissians, a technologically sophisticated race with three genders. While making quick friends, and eagerly learning about the advanced technol...

Episodes.Title: Regeneration
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: An Arctic research team makes a startling find: cybernetic creatures - Borg - buried in the ice. When the revived aliens seize control of a spacecraft, it's up to Archer to keep them from contacting the Collective and threatening ...

Episodes.Title: First Flight
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After his close friend and colleague A.G. Robinson is killed in a mountain climbing accident, Captain Archer tells T'Pol about the Warp 2 test flight almost ten years earlier.

Episodes.Title: Bounty
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: After exploring an uninhabited planet, Captain Archer is taken prisoner by a Tellarite bounty hunter who was hired by the Klingons to return Archer to Qo'noS.

Episodes.Title: The Expanse
Episodes.Writer: Gene Roddenberry, Rick Berman, Brannon Braga
Episodes.Actors: Scott Bakula, John Billingsley, Jolene Blalock
Episodes.Plot: An alien probe launches a devastating attack on Earth. Archer, still being hunted by the Klingons, brings the Enterprise back home to investigate.
